items.title: Violent Night
items.plot: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).
items.stars: David Harbour, John Leguizamo, Alex Hassell, Alexis Louder

items.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
items.plot: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
items.stars: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

items.title: The Menu
items.plot: A young couple travels to a remote island to eat at an exclusive restaurant where the chef has prepared a lavish menu, with some shocking surprises.
items.stars: Ralph Fiennes, Anya Taylor-Joy, Nicholas Hoult, Hong Chau

items.title: Spirited
items.plot: A musical version of Charles Dickens's story of a miserly misanthrope who is taken on a magical journey.
items.stars: Will Ferrell, Ryan Reynolds, Octavia Spencer, Patrick Page

items.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
items.plot: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
items.stars: Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke

items.title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
items.plot: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.
items.stars: Ewan McGregor, David Bradley, Gregory Mann, Burn Gorman

items.title: A Christmas Story
items.plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie Parker attempts to convince his parents, teacher, and Santa Claus that a Red Ryder Range 200 Shot BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.
items.stars: Peter Billingsley, Melinda Dillon, Darren McGavin, Scott Schwartz

items.title: Black Adam
items.plot: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods--and imprisoned just as quickly--Black Adam is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
items.stars: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan, Noah Centineo

items.title: Bones and All
items.plot: Maren, a young woman, learns how to survive on the margins of society.
items.stars: Timothée Chalamet, Taylor Russell, Mark Rylance, Kendle Coffey

items.title: She Said
items.plot: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.
items.stars: Carey Mulligan, Zoe Kazan, Patricia Clarkson, Andre Braugher

items.title: The Fabelmans
items.plot: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman aspires to become a filmmaker as he reaches adolescence, but soon discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of films can help him see the truth.
items.stars: Michelle Williams, Gabriel LaBelle, Paul Dano, Judd Hirsch

items.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
items.plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.
items.stars: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor

items.title: Top Gun: Maverick
items.plot: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.
items.stars: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer

items.title: Strange World
items.plot: The legendary Clades are a family of explorers whose differences threaten to topple their latest and most crucial mission.
items.stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Jaboukie Young-White, Gabrielle Union, Dennis Quaid

items.title: An Action Hero
items.plot: Youth Icon. Superstar. Action Hero. At the age of just 30, Maanav was at the peak of his career when he got caught up in an accident while filming in Haryana. Maanav, who was once a household name, is now living in hiding.
items.stars: Akshay Kumar, Nora Fatehi, Ayushmann Khurrana, Mirabel Stuart

items.title: Tár
items.plot: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and first-ever female music director of a major German orchestra.
items.stars: Cate Blanchett, Noémie Merlant, Nina Hoss, Sophie Kauer

items.title: Devotion (II)
items.plot: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.
items.stars: Jonathan Majors, Glen Powell, Christina Jackson, Thomas Sadoski

items.title: Spoiler Alert (II)
items.plot: The story of Michael Ausiello and Kit Cowan's relationship that takes a tragic turn when Cowan is diagnosed with terminal cancer.
items.stars: Jim Parsons, Ben Aldridge, Josh Pais, Allegra Heart

items.title: White Christmas
items.plot: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.
items.stars: Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Rosemary Clooney, Vera-Ellen

items.title: The Polar Express
items.plot: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.
items.stars: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis

items.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
items.plot: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.
items.stars: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Kerry Condon, Barry Keoghan

items.title: Ticket to Paradise
items.plot: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.
items.stars: George Clooney, Sean Lynch, Julia Roberts, Arielle Carver-O'Neill

items.title: Empire of Light
items.plot: A drama about the power of human connection during turbulent times, set in an English coastal town in the early 1980s.
items.stars: Olivia Colman, Micheal Ward, Colin Firth, Toby Jones

items.title: The Woman King
items.plot: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.
items.stars: Viola Davis, Thuso Mbedu, Lashana Lynch, Sheila Atim

items.title: Drishyam 2
items.plot: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?
items.stars: Ajay Devgn, Tabu, Akshaye Khanna, Shriya Saran

items.title: The Mean One
items.plot: In a sleepy mountain town, Cindy has her parents murdered and her Christmas stolen by a blood thirsty green figure in a red Santa suit.
items.stars: David Howard Thornton, Krystle Martin, Chase Mullins, Amy Schumacher

items.title: White Noise (I)
items.plot: Dramatizes a contemporary American family's attempts to deal with the mundane conflicts of everyday life while grappling with the universal mysteries of love, death, and the possibility of happiness in an uncertain world.
items.stars: Adam Driver, Greta Gerwig, Don Cheadle, Madison Gaughan

items.title: Bhediya
items.plot: Set in the forests of Arunachal, Bhediya is a story of Bhaskar, a man who gets bitten by a wolf, and begins to transform into the creature. As Bhaskar and his buddies try to find answers, a bunch of twists, turns, and laughs ensue.
items.stars: Varun Dhawan, Kriti Sanon, Abhishek Banerjee, Deepak Dobriyal

items.title: The Inspection
items.plot: A young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside.
items.stars: Jeremy Pope, Gabrielle Union, Bokeem Woodbine, Raúl Castillo

items.title: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed
items.fullTitle: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed (2022)
items.plot: Following the life of artist Nan Goldin and the downfall of the Sackler family, the pharmaceutical dynasty who was greatly responsible for the opioid epidemic's unfathomable death toll.
items.stars: Nan Goldin, David Armstrong, Marina Berio, Noemi Bonazzi

items.title: As Good As Dead
items.plot: Bryant befriends a troubled teen and introduces him to martial arts. As Bryant's mysterious and dangerous past catches up to him, he is forced into a life and death struggle to clear his name, save the boy and get back all he left behind.
items.stars: Tom Berenger, Michael Jai White, Louis Mandylor, Michael Copon

items.title: Mindcage
items.plot: When a copycat strikes, two detectives ask a top serial killer for help.
items.stars: John Malkovich, Martin Lawrence, Melissa Roxburgh, Jacob Grodnik

items.title: A Christmas Tale
items.plot: The troubled Vuillard family is no stranger to illness, grief, and banishment, but when their matriarch requires a bone-marrow transplant, the estranged clan reunites just in time for Christmas.
items.stars: Catherine Deneuve, Jean-Paul Roussillon, Mathieu Amalric, Anne Consigny

items.title: The Honeymoon (III)
items.plot: Adam and his bride, Sarah are about to embark on the romantic honeymoon of a lifetime in Venice. But when the trip is gatecrashed by Adam's best friend, Ed, it inadvertently turns their perfect lovers' holiday into a complete disaster.
items.stars: Pico Alexander, Asim Chaudhry, Flynn Allen, Kai Portman

items.title: Chunky Shrapnel
items.plot: A film following Australian band King Gizzard and the Lizard Wizard on their European Tour. A musical road movie dipped in turpentine.
items.stars: Michael Cavanagh, Cook Craig, Ambrose Kenny-Smith, Stu Mackenzie

items.title: Pom Poko
items.plot: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.
items.stars: Shinchô Kokontei, Makoto Nonomura, Yuriko Ishida, Norihei Miki

items.title: The Novelist's Film
items.plot: A female novelist takes a long trip to visit a bookstore run by a younger colleague who has fallen out of touch. Then she goes up a tower on her own and runs into a film director and his ... See full summary
items.stars: Lee Hye-yeong, Kim Min-hee, Seo Younghwa, Mi-so Park

items.title: Ballabhpurer Roopkotha
items.plot: King Bhupati Ray of Ballabhpur is almost bankrupt. He plans to sell off his dilapidated ancestral mansion to repay his debts. But the ghost of an ancestor decides to play spoilsport.
items.stars: Satyam Bhattacharya, Surangana Banerjee, Debraj Bhattacharya, Shyamal Chakraborty

items.title: The Night Owl
items.plot: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, and happens to witness the death of the crown prince.
